title: The Barricades: The only Forum dedicated to fangames

title: Re: The Barricades: The only Forum dedicated to fangames
content:
Good luck for the forum, it looks like it has already gained some user base. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I'll be reading it once in a while.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: The Barricades: The only Forum dedicated to fangames
content: That place has a nice atmosphere. I'm in.

title: Re: The Barricades: The only Forum dedicated to fangames
content:

Tell anyone who's making a fangame or interested in making a fangame about us.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: The Barricades: The only Forum dedicated to fangames

title: Re: The Barricades: The only Forum dedicated to fangames
content:
Welcome in advance. You may notice that it's pretty quiet, but I think that's because most of the people there are busy folks. I'm still checking it, at least.________________
[img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/8498/missouriansf9.png[/img]

title: Re: The Barricades: The only Forum dedicated to fangames
content: thanx, glad to be there. and yeah its kinda quiet, but thats ok (i can keep up with all the threads that way). there are other pros and cons though, you probably already know them. id like to say more, but ive gotta do some homework...
